refnamediv.refpurpose: Reopen IMAP stream to new mailbox

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function reopens the specified stream to a new mailbox on an IMAP or NNTP server.

The options are a bit mask with one or more of the following:
OP_READONLY - Open mailbox read-only
OP_ANONYMOUS - Don't use or update a .newsrc for news (NNTP only)
OP_HALFOPEN - For IMAP and NNTP names, open a connection but don't open a mailbox.
CL_EXPUNGE - Expunge mailbox automatically upon mailbox close (see also imap_delete and imap_expunge)

example.title: imap_reopen example
example.programlisting:
<?php
$mbox = imap_open("{mailget.mysql.com:143/novalidate-cert}INBOX", "hholzgraefe", "nomore6nomore6") or die(join(", ", imap_errors()));
// ...
imap_reopen($mbox, "{mailget.mysql.com:143}Inbox.Sent") or die(join(", ", imap_errors()));
// ..
?>
